name: Idol Showdown
summary:
Idol Showdown is the definitive fan-made Hololive fighting game experience, powered by rollback netcode. Engage in exciting duels as your favorite Hololive talent and prove once and for all who the strongest idol is using the game’s easy-to-learn controls.
This is a free unofficial fan-made project, made out of love for Hololive, Hololive fans, and the fighting game genre.
After 2 long years of hard work, the first complete fan-made hololive fighting game is here!
